analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho kusalo dhammo
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na kusalam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na anidassana sappaṭigham na kusalam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na kusalañca na a nidassana sa paṭigha

original: nakusalañca dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalañca dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na akusalam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā satta
na anidassana sappaṭigha na abyākata mūlāni sattam eva duka mūlāni sattam eva sabbam ekavīsatim eva

original: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekavīsa adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe avigate ekavīsa
